title: Fast and Furious
description: A score to settle. A psycho to catch. Time for the ex-conand the G-Man to shift their rate into high gear

title: Inception
description: In this mind-bending sci-fi thiller, a man runs an espionage business built around entering the subconscious of his target to mold their thoughts.

title: Inglorious Basterds
description: A jewish cinema owner in occupied Paris is forced to host a Nazi premiere, whre a group of American soldierd called the Basterds plnas a face-off.

title: Interstellar
description: With humanity teetering on the brink of extinction, a group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of another inhabitable planet.

title: The dark Knight
description: As Batman, Lt. Gordon and the district attorney continue to dismatle Gotham's criminal underground, a new villain threatens to undo their good work.

title: Despicable me
description: Villainous Gru hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land his care.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: On this 11th birthday, Harry Potter learns that he's a powerful wizard with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: When the Valley of Peace is threatend, lazy Po the panda discovers his destiny as the 'chosen one' and trains to become a kung fu hero.

title: Shrek the Third
description: Life in the swamp seems better than ever for Shrek and Fiona, until King Harold suddenly falls ill and the adorable ogre must find an heir.

title: Madagascar
description: When the ship they're on capsizes, a lion, zebra, giraffe and hippo from a zoo become stranded on Madagascar, an island populated by oddballs.

title: American Pie
description: Four longtime buddies dedicate their summer to partying and sexual conquests. It's not as simple as it sounds.

title: Bad Neighbours
description: These nice young parents hope the college boys next door are quiet. Fat chance, when the frat house motto is 'party on!'

title: The Hangover
description: What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas ... when you can't remember what the hell happened the night before.

title: Jackass the movie
description: Johnny Knoxville and his fellow pranksters wander Japan in panda outfits, wreak havoc on a golf course, perform stunts involving alligators and more.

title: Project X
description: Drugs, booze, sex and a lawn gnome. Some parties last for a night. This one will live on through history.

title: Catch me if you can
description: An FBI agent makes it his mission to put cunning con man Frank Abagnale Jr. behind bars. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.

title: Django Unchained
description: Accompanied by a German bounty hunter, a freed slave named Django travels across America to free his wife from a sadistic plantation owner.

title: The Social Network
description: A software nerd hacks into a college website. The word 'friend' and millions of lives will never be the same.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump, a friendly, simpleminded man, finds himself in the middle of nearly every major event of the 1960s and '70s.
A brilliant group of students become card-counting experts with the intent of swindling millions out of Las Vegas casinos by playing blackjack.

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: A professor must decipher a cryptic message in the Louvre. Murder and Da Vinci's art mask centuries of deception.

title: Gone Girl
description: Nick Dunne discovers that the entire media focus has shifted on him when his wife Amy Dunne disappears on the day of their fifth wedding anniversary.

title: Bird Box
description: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a survivor and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

title: Seven
description: A serial killer begins murdering people according to the seven deadly sins. Two detectives, one new to the city and the other about to retire, are tasked with apprehending the criminal.

title: Zodiac
description: Robert Graysmith, a cartoonist by profession, finds himself obsessively thinking about the Zodiac killer. He uses his puzzle-solving abilities to get closer to revealing the identity of the killer.
